events.message: I ordered a product last week but I want to request a refund as I am not satisfied with the item.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund?
My order number is 1234567 and the product did not match the description on the website.
We can process your refund immediately once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the product, the refund will be issued promptly.
Just following up to ensure your refund was processed successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Your refund case has been closed as resolved. Feel free to reach out anytime for additional support.
